text:
@TOONdids @sec1968 @realBradBrewer @JackPosobiec I think it's on CDC site too, but can't find it now.

At WHO

Look under "How does Covid 19 spread" then: "Can CoVID-19 be caught from a person who has no symptoms?"

Says:

"The risk of catching COVID-19 from someone with no symptoms at all is very low."

https://t.co/uOCSWXnsN9

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
